footer.description: Circle Creative Buro – your guide to the world of creativity and creative potential.

secondSection.firstMessage: We create bold campaigns that turn brands into
secondSection.secondMessage: that inspire, engage, and transform the market
secondSection.description: Transform your vision into reality with CIRCLE, where creativity meets strategy and brands become unstoppable forces in the market.
secondSection.aboutPeople2: People who know how to create.
secondSection.storyText: It all started with a small coffee shop, where people's potential began to unfold. Five people gathered chaos into a single rhythm. Different people, but equally burning and each added their point to the circle. Points began to connect. Design. Marketing. Strategy. Meaning. Drive.
